options.name: output-dir
options.description: Directory where output files are written. Default: input file directory

options.name: password
options.description: Password for encrypted PDF files

options.name: format
options.description: Output formats (comma-separated). Values: json, text, html, pdf, markdown, markdown-with-html, markdown-with-images. Default: json

options.name: quiet
options.description: Suppress console logging output

options.name: content-safety-off
options.description: Disable content safety filters. Values: all, hidden-text, off-page, tiny, hidden-ocg, sensitive-data

options.name: keep-line-breaks
options.description: Preserve original line breaks in extracted text

options.name: replace-invalid-chars
options.description: Replacement character for invalid/unrecognized characters. Default: space

options.name: use-struct-tree
options.description: Use PDF structure tree (tagged PDF) for reading order and semantic structure

options.name: table-method
options.description: Table detection method. Values: default (border-based), cluster (border + cluster). Default: default

options.name: reading-order
options.description: Reading order algorithm. Values: off, xycut. Default: xycut

options.name: markdown-page-separator
options.description: Separator between pages in Markdown output. Use %page-number% for page numbers. Default: none

options.name: text-page-separator
options.description: Separator between pages in text output. Use %page-number% for page numbers. Default: none

options.name: html-page-separator
options.description: Separator between pages in HTML output. Use %page-number% for page numbers. Default: none

options.name: image-output
options.description: Image output mode. Values: off (no images), embedded (Base64 data URIs), external (file references). Default: external

options.name: image-format
options.description: Output format for extracted images. Values: png, jpeg. Default: png

options.name: image-dir
options.description: Directory for extracted images

options.name: pages
options.description: Pages to extract (e.g., "1,3,5-7"). Default: all pages

options.name: include-header-footer
options.description: Include page headers and footers in output

options.name: hybrid
options.description: Hybrid backend for AI processing. Values: off (default), docling-fast, azure

options.name: hybrid-mode
options.description: Hybrid triage mode. Values: auto (default, dynamic triage), full (skip triage, all pages to backend)

options.name: hybrid-url
options.description: Hybrid backend server URL (overrides default)

options.name: hybrid-timeout
options.description: Hybrid backend request timeout in milliseconds. Default: 30000

options.name: hybrid-fallback
options.description: Fallback to Java processing on hybrid backend error. Default: true

options.name: hybrid-api-key
options.description: API key for hybrid backends requiring authentication (e.g., Azure). Can also use AZURE_API_KEY environment variable
